TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LabelEditEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的索引和标题 ，以及用户编辑后的标题。A specifies the index and caption of a and the caption after it has been edited by the user. 此类还提供 属性。This class also provides a property. 您可以在事件处理程序中使用此属性 来阻止用户编辑标签。You can use this property in a event handler to prevent the user from editing the label. 您还可以在 事件处理程序中使用它来还原更改，并将其标签返回到其原始值。You can also use it in an event handler to revert the change, returning the label it to its original value. 如果要在提交更改之前验证用户输入，则此方法非常有用。This is useful when you want to validate user input before committing the change. > [!NOTE] > 由于在 提交标签编辑之前发生事件，因此 在此事件的处理程序中调用方法将使用原始值对项进行排序。Because the event takes place before the label edit is committed, calling the method in a handler for this event will sort the item using the original value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件以及如何使用 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates handling the event and using the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的控件的窗体中， `ListView1` 并至少填充3个项。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control named `ListView1` and populated with at least 3 items. 确保所有事件都与其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在 运行时引发或事件来指定要编辑的列表项时，可以使用此构造函数 。You can use this constructor when raising the or event at run time to specify a list item in the to edit. 构造函数还可用于指定与的标签关联的新文本 。The constructor also enables you to specify the new text associated with the label of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应取消对 的标签所作的更改。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether changes made to the label of the should be canceled.

value.span: 如果应取消 标签的编辑操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the edit operation of the label for the should be canceled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性来取消对的标签所做的更改 并将其还原为原始文本。You can use this property to cancel changes made to the label of a and revert it to its original text. 使用此属性可防止将项的标题更改为不符合应用程序要求的值。Use this property to prevent an item's caption from being changed to a value that does not meet your application's requirements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件以及如何使用 和 属性。The following code example demonstrates handling the event and using the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为 "ListView1" 的 ListView 控件的窗体中，并至少填充3个项。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a ListView control named ListView1 and populated with at least 3 items. 确保所有事件都与其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListView3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListView3/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `ListView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#463](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#463)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#463](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#463)]
